title: Best of The Herd for Jun 08, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jun 08, 2020
description:
Roger Goodell is siding with the players instead of Trump

Rookie QBs should play immediately

Drew Brees is getting things right after a bad comment

Dabo Swinney looks rigid and stubborn

Where Colin was right, where Colin was wrong


Guest: TJ Houshmandzadeh, Former NFL WR & FOX Sports NFL Analyst

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
